name: Stone Drake: Guardian Stance
description: When Spirit of Omen: Stone Drake is in play, when Eremite Stone Enchanter takes DMG: DMG received reduced by 2. Consume 1 additional Usage(s) when negating Geo DMG. (Once per Round. Usage consumption required)
